cards.title: Domestic/Personal Storage
cards.content: Are you between houses? Having a clear out? Redecorating, extending or renovating? Need to combine two homes into one? – Then we have the solution.

link.title: How much space do I need?

cards.title: Business/Commercial Storage
cards.content: As a business customer you can use self storage as an extension to your own premises. Store tools and equipment, excess furniture, surplus stock or self-managed archival material.

link.title: How much space do I need?

value.title: Internal Storage
value.content: Convenient central location with excellent parking facilities offering a wide variety of internal units suited to your needs.

value.title: Drive up External
value.content: Our external storage site is situated on the on the outskirts of town, offering secure direct drive up storage units with 24 hr digital customer access 365 days a year.

value.title: Free courtesy van
value.content: Transfer your items to your new self-storage unit with FREE use of our courtesy van.
items: Available to anyone renting a unit

features.title: Full Security
features.content: Our electric gated, alarmed and fenced premises in Harrogate are monitored 24/7 using the latest HD CCTV technology.

features.title: Keep your keys
features.content: We provide you with your own personal keys and padlock so you are the only one with access to your storage unit.

features.title: Insurance approved
features.content: We offer fully comprehensive insurance at very competitive prices.

features.title: 365 day access
features.content: You can access the storage site 24 hours a day, 365 days a year – no need for appointments.

features.title: Need help?
features.content: Our friendly team are on hand to help you out however we can.

features.title: Storage options
features.content: We have a wide range of units available so we can meet your storage requirements.
